name: Oz Ifti
text: One of the few remaining Pizza Hut restaurants that offer dine in option and have a buffet.

name: Saidi Mchumo
text: Not the best place to eat. Place not clean and the waitress came with a bad attitude. We walked right out of there.

name: Phillip Rogers
text: Pizza Hut corporate would be embarrassed by the operation at this location.  I can overlook the dated and tired decor but what I can't overlook is the poor customer service at this location.  This Pizza Hut sits in the shadow of Delta â€¦More

name: Samuel Bennett
text: They always serves great tasting pizza and wings. Kinda wish this establishment was a little cleaner. But has clean food.

name: mashuganah vinny
text: The positive reviews seem to have been written by the workers at the restaurant. Last two times I went the buffet was always empty with 12 people waiting to pounce every time pizza came out. Staff was not friendly or apologetic but seemed â€¦More

name: Greg Greeson
text: Only two people in the dining room both at the same table and you would not believe how bad service is. Just poor must be a Corp store.

name: Zaneta Willis
text: This carryout visit was seamless.  I ordered online. I was greeted when I came in, food was ready, order was correct, hot, and tasty too. The staff was courteous. This was one of my more pleasant experiences at this location.  I stopped â€¦More

name: Amber Guy
text: Great lunch buffet! They make you a salad of your preference. The servers are nice and the food is hot

name: Jennette Williams
text: Fast service.... great lunch deals... great for children to dine or families...

name: Rashid Shelton
text: Great staff.  Albert is the best!  He really goes the extra mile consistently each and every time.

name: Phillip Rogers
text: This Pizza Hut's owner hasn't a clue.  If the lunch buffet was properly marketed, monitored and had adequete staff they would be packed daily.  Sometimes even an hours lunch break isn't enough time for the slow buffet that keeps being â€¦More

name: Evangelist Yolanda Flemister
text: Although greeted when I came in. The service is very poor. The only thing on the buffet table was pizza. The salad is behind the counter and was not offered to me at all. I had to ask if there was anything else apart of the buffet to know â€¦More

name: Nikki Lee
text: It's good but they have a tendency to forget your sauce.

name: Brad Keith
text: This pizza hut is surprisingly good for the area it is in. Staff is friendly and the pizza us good. Don't let the old neighborhood fool ya.

name: Amina Porter
text: Pizza Hut always has my daughter's personal pan pizza fresh and hot, just the way she likes it. Only takes a few minutes for the pizza to be ready by the time we walk in. Their food is just splended!ðŸ˜„

name: Dave G
text: Old, dark, run down, and understaffed. I can't believe it stays in business. Badly in need of renovation. Food is consistant at least.

name: Ericka Gibson
text: Ordered 3 toppings...came in & paid. Ran out of mushrooms...didn't call me to change toppings...NOTHING! Made my pizza wrong! Manager got mad...I got my money back! Haven't been back since!!! Always out of packets.

name: George Stuart
text: It's Pizza Hut. Exactly what you would expect. Good pizza ready when I arrived after ordering on their app.

name: Bashun Lavender
text: Lunch buffet the way to go for your pizza fix. Optional salad was drowned in Caesar dressing but hit the spot. One of the last Pizza Hut buffets left in metro ATL.

name: lee brown
text: Clean and pleasant atmosphere, good service..

name: Randy l
text: Staff lacked a little common sense. I asked for a drink for my 2 year old and they brought me an adult size cup. I requested a kid size cup with lid. Smh.

name: Eric Carlsen
text: buffet can definitely be hit or miss during lunchtime, usually a miss... although it is fun to watch everyone run up and fight over each new pizza that is brought out

name: alexander martino
text: Was an inconvenience to the worker there. She never asked about my crust prefrance. Took 15 min to get my order ( I was the only one there). No refill of drink either. Food was good but wrong.

name: Tink Amani
text: Staff Was Great. Busy Spot So Its Kinda Hectic Service But Worth It In The End.

name: Mandee Lindsey
text: Whenever I order online they are always prompt and my order is ready when I pick up. If i happen to order something they may be out of, I immediately get a call not even 5 min after my order has been placed to let me know.

name: Tazio Loglisi
text: Always had excellent service, I've always liked Pizza Hut's Pizza overall but in the end everyone has their own personal preference.

name: Shunna Sullivan
text: They R SOOO! UNDERSTAFFED! & The MANAGER! Has A VERY NASTY! ATTITUDE! I Called In & They Said! 30 min. I Waited 30 Min. & Got There & My Pizza Was Not Ready! I Had 2 Wait An Additional 20 Min. SMMFH! They Should Have Kept It Real!!

name: kris perry
text: Poor service and not very clear on prices/deals. The food was good though.

name: Ken Jackson
text: I wanted to give a half a star. Customer service terrible. Get home pizza old and terrible. They need fire entire staff and get people who want to work and take pride in their job. 30+ years of eating Pizza Hut by far the worst experience ever with them 01/30/2017 5:35pm

name: Danny Champion
text: We were the only people in the store and waited five minutes before we were seated.  We sat at a dirty table, with used place mats, and waited another five minutes.  Since nobody wanted to even take our drink orders (remember, we were the only people in the restaurant), we left. Nobody noticed.

name: Rosie
text: Great service. Fast and freindly!

name: K Miles
text: Not the first bad experience at this location. Ordered a Big Dipper online only to receive a phone call while enroute to pick it up (no message left btw) apparently they didn't have the proper dough to make it. The guy over the phone was â€¦More

name: Jon Colleion
text: Service is slow at this location. And the pizza upset my stomach. ðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘Ž

name: Candace Brown
text: Great place to enjoy fresh, hot pizza with open buffet!! Great staff!!!!!!

name: Chikodi Scott
text: Worst staff ever. Rude employees that need customer service training. Pizza always cold. Need to add delivery to this location.

name: Mufasa Dolo
text: Good food, moderate service

name: Niraj Doshi
text: Took 35 mins to serve the order and not a hint of apology. Rude staff.

name: Latosha McKinley
text: Great service! Fast & friendly!

name: chessonya leslie
text: Always get my very simple order wrong and they have bad attitudes.

name: daniel ray
text: It has permanently closed ,but Google won't mark it as such. Even when it was open it wasn't that great.

name: Felicia Talbot
text: Took over an hour to get our food. When pizza was finally delivered I asked for a box because I was on a time limit but the waitress response was "you haven't even taken a bite" and she walked off.

name: NAKED BABIES CREW LLC
text: Used to work there in the 90s. The store has gone down in professionalism and service.

name: Jass Reacts
text: Good food but the service is terrible these people need to be restrained the phones are ringing none stop and everyones in the back including the manager

name: Reginald Dansby
text: Closed earlier than time on the website.  Drove from my hotel for nothing.

name: Dave Mils
text: Order online you will be greatfull

name: ReallyTamya
text: Their pizza is good!!

name: Michael Lindsey
text: Great lunch buffet

name: Carissa Engelbert
text: Took my order and my money and never got the pizza. Got a free pizza for the "inconvenience" and they didn't make that one either.

name: sylvia figueroa
text: Poor service... I'm guessing the scrawny little man is having a bad day
